data.title: The Descendents of Don Pedro Fernandez de Velasco
data.text:
Compiled by John D. Inclan

Generation No. 1

1. HIGH CHAMBERLAIN PEDRO5 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, 1ST COUNT OF HARO (JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) was born Abt. 1395, and died 1470. He married BEATRIZ MANRIQUE-DE-LARA-Y-CASTILLA, daughter of PEDRO MANRIQUE-DE-LARA and LEONOR DE CASTILLA.

Notes for HIGH CHAMBERLAIN PEDRO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, 1ST COUNT OF HARO:

From the book, Historia Genealogica de las Familias Mas Antiguas de Mexico, by Don Ricardo Ortega y Perez Gallardo.

Children of PEDRO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO and BEATRIZ MANRIQUE-DE-LARA-Y-CASTILLA are:

2. i. FRANCISCO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO.

ii. SANCHO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO.

iii. LUIS FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO.

3. iv. 2ND COUNT OF HARO PEDRO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, b. Abt. 1415; d. 01 Jun 1492.

4. v. 1ST COUNTESS OF HARO MARIA PEREZ-DE-VELASCO-Y-MANRIQUE.

Generation No. 2

2. FRANCISCO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO (PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) He married MARIA DE MENDOZA, daughter of INIGO LOPEZ-DE-MENDOZA and CATALINA SUAREZ-DE-FIGUEROA. She was born 1430.

Notes for FRANCISCO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO:

The 2nd Count of Haro. In 1472 he was made Constable of Castilla, Spain. Source:From the book, Historia Genealogica de las Familias Mas Antiguas de Mexico, by Don Ricardo Ortega y Perez Gallardo.

Child of FRANCISCO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO and MARIA DE MENDOZA is:

5. i. BERNARDINO7 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, d. 1512.

3. 2ND COUNT OF HARO PEDRO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO (PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) was born Abt. 1415, and died 01 Jun 1492. He married MARQUESES MENCIA DE MENDOZA-Y-FIGUEROA, daughter of INIGO LOPEZ-DE-MENDOZA and CATALINA SUAREZ-DE-FIGUEROA. She was born 1430.

Notes for 2ND COUNT OF HARO PEDRO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO:

He was the 2nd Count of Haro, Constable of Castile,

Notes for MARQUESES MENCIA DE MENDOZA-Y-FIGUEROA:

The 1st Marqueses de Santillana, and the sister of the Duke of Infantado.

From her marriage, she held the title of the Countess of Haro.

Children of PEDRO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO and MENCIA DE MENDOZA-Y-FIGUEROA are:

6. i. 1ST DUKE OF FRIAS BERNARDINO7 DE VELASCO, d. 1512.

7. ii. 2ND DUKE OF FRIAS INIGO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, b. Abt. 1460; d. 17 Oct 1528.

8. iii. LEONOR DE-LA-VEGA-Y-VELASCO, b. 1450.

9. iv. MARIA DE VELASCO.

10. v. ISABEL FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, b. 1465.

11. vi. CATARINA DE VELASCO.

4. 1ST COUNTESS OF HARO MARIA6 PEREZ-DE-VELASCO-Y-MANRIQUE (PEDRO5 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, 1ST COUNT OF HARO, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) She married 2ND COUNT OF MELGAR AFONSO ENRIQUEZ, III ALMIRANTE DE CASTILLA, son of FADRIQUE ENRIQUEZ and TERESA DE QUIONES-Y-TOLEDO.

Children of MARIA PEREZ-DE-VELASCO-Y-MANRIQUE and AFONSO ENRIQUEZ are:

i. BERNARDINO7 ENRIQUEZ-DE-VELASCO, m. (1) ISABEL DE CABRERA; m. (2) ISABEL DE-LA-CERDA-Y-MENDOZA.

ii. 2ND COUNT OF MELGAR FADRIQUE ENRIQUEZ, IV ALMIRANTE DE CASTILLA, m. ANA DE CABRERA.

12. iii. FERNANDO ENRIQUEZ, 1ST DUKE OF MEDINA DE RIOSECO.

Generation No. 3

5. BERNARDINO7 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO (FRANCISCO6, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) died 1512. He married MARIA ENRIQUEZ-DE-SARMIENTO, daughter of HERNANDO DE BANUELOS and BEATRIZ-ISABEL DE ALCOCER.

Child of BERNARDINO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO and MARIA ENRIQUEZ-DE-SARMIENTO is:

13. i. DIEGO8 TREMINO-DE-VELASCO, b. Abt. 1474, Seville, Spain.

6. 1ST DUKE OF FRIAS BERNARDINO7 DE VELASCO (PEDRO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1)1 died 1512. He married (1) JUANA-MARIA DE ARAGON, daughter of FERDINAND CATHOLIC) and ALDONZA RUIZ-DE-IBORRE-Y-ALEMANY. He married (2) BLANCA DE HERRERA, daughter of GARCIA GONZALEZ-DE-HERRERA and MARIA NINO-DE-PORTUGAL.

Notes for 1ST DUKE OF FRIAS BERNARDINO DE VELASCO:

On March 20, 1492, he received the title of the 1st Duke of Frias. 3th Count of Haro. Constable of Castile/

Child of BERNARDINO DE VELASCO and JUANA-MARIA DE ARAGON is:

i. JULIANA-ANGELA8 DE VELASCO-Y-ARAGON, m. 3RD DUKE OF FRIAS PEDRO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO; d. 10 Nov 1559.

Child of BERNARDINO DE VELASCO and BLANCA DE HERRERA is:

14. ii. ANA8 DE VELASCO-Y-HERRERA, b. 1500.

7. 2ND DUKE OF FRIAS INIGO7 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO (PEDRO6, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) was born Abt. 1460, and died 17 Oct 1528. He married MARQUESES MARIA DE TOVAR-Y-VIVERO 1480, daughter of LUIS DE TOVAR and MARIA DE VIVERO-Y-SOTOMAYOR.

Notes for 2ND DUKE OF FRIAS INIGO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO:

2nd Duke of Frias, 4th Count of Haro

Notes for MARQUESES MARIA DE TOVAR-Y-VIVERO:

1st Marqueses de Berlanga.

Children of INIGO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO and MARIA DE TOVAR-Y-VIVERO are:

i. 3RD DUKE OF FRIAS PEDRO8 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, d. 10 Nov 1559; m. JULIANA-ANGELA DE VELASCO-Y-ARAGON.

15. ii. 1ST MARQUEZ OF BERLANGA JUAN DE VELASCO-Y-TOVAR.

16. iii. ISABEL DE VELASCO.

iv. INIGO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO-Y-TOVAR.

Notes for INIGO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO-Y-TOVAR:

On November 15, 1647, he served as Governor of Milan.

v. BERNARDINO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO-Y-TOVAR.

Notes for BERNARDINO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO-Y-TOVAR:

On Febuary 24, 1646, he served as Governor of Milan.

8. LEONOR7 DE-LA-VEGA-Y-VELASCO (PEDRO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) was born 1450. She married 2ND COUNT OF URENA JUAN TELLEZ-GIRON, son of PEDRO TELLES-GIRON and ISABEL DE-LAS-CASAS-Y-FERNANDEZ-HURTADO.

Children of LEONOR DE-LA-VEGA-Y-VELASCO and JUAN TELLEZ-GIRON are:

i. JUANA8 TELLEZ-GIRON-Y-FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCP, m. (1) ENRIQUE DE GUZMAN, 4TH DUKE OF MEDINA SIDONIA; d. 1513; m. (2) RODRIGO PONCE-DE-LEON.

ii. PEDRO TELLEZ-GIRON.

17. iii. 4TH COUNT OF URENA JUAN TELLEZ-GIRON, b. Abt. 1494; d. 1558.

18. iv. ISABEL TELLEZ-GIRON.

19. v. MARIA GIRON-DE-LA-VEGA-Y-VELASCO.

9. MARIA7 DE VELASCO (PEDRO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) She married (1) 1ST DUKE OF ALBUQUERQUE BELTRAN DE-LA-CUEVA, son of DIEGO FERNANDEZ-DE-LA-CUEVA and MAJOR-ALFONSO DE MERCADO. He was born 1440, and died 01 Nov 1492. She married (2) 1ST DUKE OF ESCALONA JUAN DE PACHECO.

Notes for 1ST DUKE OF ALBUQUERQUE BELTRAN DE-LA-CUEVA:

In 1464, he received thr title of the 1st Duke of Albuquerque.

Children of MARIA DE VELASCO and BELTRAN DE-LA-CUEVA are:

20. i. CRISTOBAL8 DE-LA-CUEVA.

21. ii. ANTONIO DE-LA-CUEVA.

Child of MARIA DE VELASCO and JUAN DE PACHECO is:

iii. MENCIA8 DE PACHECO-Y-VELASCO, m. DIEGO DE CARDENAS.

10. ISABEL7 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO (PEDRO6, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) was born 1465. She married 3RD DUKE MEDINA SIDONIA JUAN-ALONSO DE GUZMAN-Y-AFAN-DE-RIBERA 1488, son of ENRIQUE DE GUZMAN-Y-MENEZES and LEONOR-AFAN DE RIBERA-Y-MENDOZA. He was born 1464, and died 16 Jul 1507.

Notes for 3RD DUKE MEDINA SIDONIA JUAN-ALONSO DE GUZMAN-Y-AFAN-DE-RIBERA:

3rd Duke of Medina Sidonia.

Children of ISABEL FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO and JUAN-ALONSO DE GUZMAN-Y-AFAN-DE-RIBERA are:

22. i. LEONOR8 DE MENDOZA.

ii. ENRIQUE DE GUZMAN, 4TH DUKE OF MEDINA SIDONIA, d. 1513; m. JUANA TELLEZ-GIRON-Y-FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCP.

23. iii. MENCIA DE GUZMAN.

iv. ALONSO DE GUZMAN, 5TH DUKE OF MEDINA SIDONIA, b. 1500; d. 1549; m. ANA DE ARAGON; b. 1502.

11. CATARINA7 DE VELASCO (PEDRO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) She married 2ND COUNT OF MIRANDA PEDRO DE ZUNIGA-Y-AVELLANEDA, son of DIEGO DE ZUNIGA and ALDONZA DE AVELLANEDA. He was born 1440, and died 1492.

Children of CATARINA DE VELASCO and PEDRO DE ZUNIGA-Y-AVELLANEDA are:

24. i. FRANCISCO8 DE ZUNIGA-Y-AVELLANEDA.

ii. JUAN DE ZUNIGA-Y-AVELLANEDA.

12. FERNANDO7 ENRIQUEZ, 1ST DUKE OF MEDINA DE RIOSECO (MARIA6 PEREZ-DE-VELASCO-Y-MANRIQUE, PEDRO5 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, 1ST COUNT OF HARO, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) He married MARIA GIRON-DE-LA-VEGA-Y-VELASCO, daughter of JUAN TELLEZ-GIRON and LEONOR DE-LA-VEGA-Y-VELASCO.

Notes for FERNANDO ENRIQUEZ, 1ST DUKE OF MEDINA DE RIOSECO:

A.K.A. Luis Enriquez

Children of FERNANDO ENRIQUEZ and MARIA GIRON-DE-LA-VEGA-Y-VELASCO are:

25. i. LUIS8 ENRIQUEZ, 2ND DUKE OF MEDINA DE RIOSECO, d. 24 Sep 1572.

26. ii. LUISA ENRIQUEZ.

Generation No. 4

13. DIEGO8 TREMINO-DE-VELASCO (BERNARDINO7 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, FRANCISCO6, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) was born Abt. 1474 in Seville, Spain. He married FRANCISCA ALCOIDEO-ASCOIDE in Spain. She was born 1502 in Seville, Spain.

Marriage Notes for DIEGO TREMINO-DE-VELASCO and FRANCISCA ALCOIDEO-ASCOIDE:

Marriage source:Fundadores de Nueva Galicia - Guadalajara - Tomo I, by Guillermo Garmendia Leal.

Page 142.

Children of DIEGO TREMINO-DE-VELASCO and FRANCISCA ALCOIDEO-ASCOIDE are:

i. FRANCISCO9 DE TREMINO-DE-BANUELOS, b. Spain.

Notes for FRANCISCO DE TREMINO-DE-BANUELOS:

Source:From the book, New Mexico's First Colonists, compiled and arranged by David H. Snow.

ii. FRANCISCA DE VELASCO, b. Abt. 1525, Seville, Spain; d. Aft. 05 Aug 1589, Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico; m. FRANCISCO CORNEJO-MALDONADO, Abt. 1542, Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico; b. Abt. 1520, Salamanca, Spain; d. Abt. 1559, Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico.

Notes for FRANCISCA DE VELASCO:

On August 5, 1589, she signed her last will and testament. Source:Fundadores de Nueva Galicia - Guadalajara - Tomo I, by Guillermo Garmendia Leal. Page 42.

Marriage Notes for FRANCISCA DE VELASCO and FRANCISCO CORNEJO-MALDONADO:

Marriage source:From the book, Fundadores de Nueva Galicia - Guadalajara - Tomo I, by Guillermo Garmendia Leal.

Page 41.

iii. ALONSO DE VELASCO, b. Abt. 1527.

iv. CAPTAIN GENERAL BALTAZAR DE TREMINO-DE-BANUELOS, b. Abt. 1530, Villa Banuelos, Burgos, Spain; d. 1600, Zacatecas, Zacatecas, Mexico; m. (2) MARIA DE SALDIVAR-Y-MENDOZA, 1572, Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico; b. Zacatecas, Mexico.

Notes for CAPTAIN GENERAL BALTAZAR DE TREMINO-DE-BANUELOS:

Descendent of the Count of Haro, Lord High Constable of Castilla, Spain and Nobleman Lord of Bribiesca and of Medina of the Pomar. Genealogical History of the Most Ancient Families of Mexico, by Don Ricardo Ortega y Perez Gallardo.

Conquistador and one of the founders of Zacatecas. Source:Mil Familias III by Rodolfo Gonzalez de la Garza. Page 316.

New Mexico's First Colonists, compiled and arranged by David H. Snow.

Marriage Notes for BALTAZAR DE TREMINO-DE-BANUELOS and MARIA DE SALDIVAR-Y-MENDOZA:

Marriage source:Mil Familias III by Rodolfo Gonzalez de la Garza. Page 316.

Fundadores de Nueva Galicia - Guadalajara - Tomo I, by Guillermo Garmendia Leal. Page 74 and 143.

v. MARIANA BANUELOS, b. Abt. 1535, Seville, Spain; m. FRANCISCO DE FIGUEROA, Aft. 1543, Zacatecas, Zacatecas, Mexico; b. Spain.

Notes for MARIANA BANUELOS:

A.K.A. Ana de Tremino.

Marriage Notes for MARIANA BANUELOS and FRANCISCO DE FIGUEROA:

Marriage source:Fundadores de Nueva Galicia - Guadalajara - Tomo I, by Guillermo Garmendia Leal.

Page 143.

vi. JOSE-DIEGO DE TREMINO, b. Abt. 1537, Seville, Spain; d. Abt. 1634; m. BEATRIZ DE QUINTANILLA-DE-FARIAS, Abt. 1557, Mexico City, F.D., Mexico; b. Abt. 1539.

Notes for JOSE-DIEGO DE TREMINO:

Note:Records list his last name as Tremino.

Family source from the book Origen de los Fundadores de Texas, Nuevo Mexico, Coahulia, y Nuevo Leon, by Guillermo Garmendia Leal.

Marriage Notes for JOSE-DIEGO DE TREMINO and BEATRIZ DE QUINTANILLA-DE-FARIAS:

Marriage source:Mil Familias III by Rodolfo Gonzalez de la Garza. Page 316.

Fundadores de Nueva Galicia - Guadalajara - Tomo I, by Guillermo Garmendia Leal. Page 74.

14. ANA8 DE VELASCO-Y-HERRERA (BERNARDINO7 DE VELASCO, PEDRO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) was born 1500. She married ALFONSO PIMENTEL, 5TH COUNT OF BENAVENTE.

Children of ANA DE VELASCO-Y-HERRERA and ALFONSO PIMENTEL are:

i. BLANCA9 PIMENTEL, m. 3RD MARQUEZ DE AGUILAR JUAN FERNANDEZ-MANRIQUEZ-DE-LARA.

ii. ANTONIO PIMENTEL, 6TH COUNT OF BENAVENTE, m. LUISA ENRIQUEZ.

15. 1ST MARQUEZ OF BERLANGA JUAN8 DE VELASCO-Y-TOVAR (INIGO7 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO6, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) He married (1) JUANA ENRIQUEZ-DE-RIBERA-PORTOCARRERO-Y-CARDENAS, daughter of FERNANDO ENRIQUEZ-DE-RIBERA and INES PORTOCARRERO-Y-CARDENAS. He married (2) LEONOR DE RECALDE.

Notes for 1ST MARQUEZ OF BERLANGA JUAN DE VELASCO-Y-TOVAR:

The 1st Marques de Berlanga.

Notes for JUANA ENRIQUEZ-DE-RIBERA-PORTOCARRERO-Y-CARDENAS:

Sister to Afan de Ribera y Portocarreo, the 1st Duke of Alcala de los gazules, (1558-1571).

Children of JUAN DE VELASCO-Y-TOVAR and JUANA ENRIQUEZ-DE-RIBERA-PORTOCARRERO-Y-CARDENAS are:

i. 4TH DUKE OF FRIAS INIGO9 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO-Y-TOVAR, b. 1530; d. 1585; m. ANA-ANGELA PEREZ-DE-GUZMAN-Y-ARAGON, 1545; b. 1525; d. 1589.

Notes for 4TH DUKE OF FRIAS INIGO FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO-Y-TOVAR:

The 4th Duke of Frias.

ii. ISABEL DE VELASCO, m. ANTONIO GOMEZ-DE-MENDOZA.

iii. INEZ DE VELASCO, m. 4TH COUNT OF MONTERREY JERONIMO DE ACEVEDO-Y-ZUNIGA.

16. ISABEL8 DE VELASCO (INIGO7 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO6, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) She married 2ND DUKE OF MAQUEDA BERNARDINO DE CARDENAS, son of DIEGO DE CARDENAS and MENCIA PACHECO. He died 1560.

Children of ISABEL DE VELASCO and BERNARDINO DE CARDENAS are:

i. ANA-MARIA9 DE CARDENAS, m. FRANCISCO HURTADO-DE-MENDOZA.

ii. 3RD MARQUEZ OF ELCHE BERNARDINO DE CARDENAS, m. JUANA DE BRAGANCA; b. 1521.

Notes for JUANA DE BRAGANCA:

A.K.A. Juana de Portugal

17. 4TH COUNT OF URENA JUAN8 TELLEZ-GIRON (LEONOR7 DE-LA-VEGA-Y-VELASCO, PEDRO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) was born Abt. 1494, and died 1558. He married MARIA DE-LA-CUEVA-Y-ALVAREZ-DE-TOLEDO, daughter of FRANCISCO FERNANDEZ-DE-LA-CUEVA-Y-DE-MENDOZA and FRANCISCA ALVAREZ-DE-TOLEDO.

Children of JUAN TELLEZ-GIRON and MARIA DE-LA-CUEVA-Y-ALVAREZ-DE-TOLEDO are:

i. 1ST DUKE OF OSUNA PEDRO9 TELLEZ-GIRON-Y-DE-LA-CUEVA, b. 1537; d. 1590; m. LEONOR-ANA PEREZ-DE-GUZMAN-Y-ARAGON2; b. 1540.

Notes for 1ST DUKE OF OSUNA PEDRO TELLEZ-GIRON-Y-DE-LA-CUEVA:

1st Duke of Osuna, 5th Count of Urena.

ii. MADALENA TELLEZ-GIRON-Y-DE-LA-CUEVA.

iii. MARIA TELLEZ-GIRON-Y-DE-LA-CUEVA.

18. ISABEL8 TELLEZ-GIRON (LEONOR7 DE-LA-VEGA-Y-VELASCO, PEDRO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) She married 3RD DUKE OF ALBURQUERQUE BELTRAN DE-LA-CUEVA-Y-ALVAREZ-DE-TOLEDO, son of FRANCISCO FERNANDEZ-DE-LA-CUEVA-Y-DE-MENDOZA and FRANCISCA ALVAREZ-DE-TOLEDO. He died 11 Feb 1559/60.

Children of ISABEL TELLEZ-GIRON and BELTRAN DE-LA-CUEVA-Y-ALVAREZ-DE-TOLEDO are:

i. 4TH DUKE OF ALBURQUERQUE FRANCISCO9 FERNANDEZ-DE-LA-CUEVA-Y-GIRON, d. 1563; m. MARIA FERNANDEZ-DE-CORDOVA.

ii. LEONOR DE-LA-CUEVA-Y-GIRON.

iii. 5TH DUKE OF ALBURQUERQUE GABRIEL FERNANDEZ-DE-LA-CUEVA-Y-GIRON, d. 1571; m. 3RD MARQUESA OF LADRADA JUANA DE-LA-LAMA-Y-DE-LA-CUEVA3; d. 1584.

19. MARIA8 GIRON-DE-LA-VEGA-Y-VELASCO (LEONOR7 DE-LA-VEGA-Y-VELASCO, PEDRO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) She married FERNANDO ENRIQUEZ, 1ST DUKE OF MEDINA DE RIOSECO, son of AFONSO ENRIQUEZ and MARIA PEREZ-DE-VELASCO-Y-MANRIQUE.

Notes for FERNANDO ENRIQUEZ, 1ST DUKE OF MEDINA DE RIOSECO:

A.K.A. Luis Enriquez

Children are listed above under (12) Fernando Enriquez, 1st Duke of Medina de Rioseco.

20. CRISTOBAL8 DE-LA-CUEVA (MARIA7 DE VELASCO, PEDRO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) He married 3RD COUNTESS OF SIRUELA LEONOR DE VELASCO, daughter of FRANCISCO DE VELASCO and FRANCISCA FERNANDEZ-DE-CORDOVA.

Child of CRISTOBAL DE-LA-CUEVA and LEONOR DE VELASCO is:

i. GABRIEL9 DE-LA-CUEVA, m. TERESA DE ZUNIGA.

21. ANTONIO8 DE-LA-CUEVA (MARIA7 DE VELASCO, PEDRO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) He married ELVIRA DE AYALA.

Child of ANTONIO DE-LA-CUEVA and ELVIRA DE AYALA is:

i. FRANCISCO9 DE-LA-CUEVA, m. JUANA PORTOCARRERO.

22. LEONOR8 DE MENDOZA (ISABEL7 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO6, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) She married 4TH DUKE OF BRAGANCA JAIME, son of FERNANDO and INFANTA ISABEL.

Children of LEONOR DE MENDOZA and 4TH JAIME are:

i. TEODOSIO9I, 5TH DUKE OF BRAGANCE, m. (1) ISABEL OF LANCASTER; b. 1520; m. (2) BEATRIZ OF LANCASTER.

ii. ISABEL DE BRAGANCA, b. 1514; m. PRINCE OF PORTUGAL EDWARD, 1537; b. 07 Oct 1515; d. 20 Sep 1540.

23. MENCIA8 DE GUZMAN (ISABEL7 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO6, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) She married 3RD COUNT OF URENA PEDRO TELLEZ-GIRON.

Child of MENCIA DE GUZMAN and PEDRO TELLEZ-GIRON is:

i. MARIA9 TELLEZ-GIRON, m. MARQUEZ OF BERLANGA INIGO DE VELASCO-DE-TOVAR.

24. FRANCISCO8 DE ZUNIGA-Y-AVELLANEDA (CATARINA7 DE VELASCO, PEDRO6 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, PEDRO5, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) He married MARIA DE CARDENAS-Y-ENRIQUEZ.

Children of FRANCISCO DE ZUNIGA-Y-AVELLANEDA and MARIA DE CARDENAS-Y-ENRIQUEZ are:

i. ANA9 DE ZUNIGA, m. JUAN ARIAS-DE-SAAVEDRA.

ii. TERESA DE ZUNIGA-Y-CARDENAS, m. PEDRO DE ZUNIGA.

25. LUIS8 ENRIQUEZ, 2ND DUKE OF MEDINA DE RIOSECO (FERNANDO7, MARIA6 PEREZ-DE-VELASCO-Y-MANRIQUE, PEDRO5 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, 1ST COUNT OF HARO, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) died 24 Sep 1572. He married ANA DE CABRERA-Y-MONCADA, daughter of JUAN DE CABRERA and ANA DE MONCADA.

Children of LUIS ENRIQUEZ and ANA DE CABRERA-Y-MONCADA are:

i. LUISA9 ENRIQUEZ-DE-CABRERA, b. 1540; d. 18 Feb 1602/03; m. 5TH DUKE OF INFANTADO INIGO LOPEZ-DE-MENDOZA4; b. 15 Mar 1535/36, 1540; d. 29 Aug 1601.

Notes for 5TH DUKE OF INFANTADO INIGO LOPEZ-DE-MENDOZA:

The 5th Duke of Infantado and the Marques of Cenete.

ii. 3RD DUKE OF RIOSECO LUIS ENRIQUEZ-DE-CABRERA, d. 27 May 1596; m. 5TH COUNTESS OF SALDANA ANA DE MENDOZA-Y-MENDOZA.

Notes for 3RD DUKE OF RIOSECO LUIS ENRIQUEZ-DE-CABRERA:

The VII Almirante de Castilla, and the 3rd Duke of Medina de Rioseco.

iii. FRANCISCA ENRIQUEZ-DE-CABRERA, m. FRANCISCO DE ROJAS5.

iv. ANA ENRIQUEZ-DE-CABRERA, m. PEDRO DE ZUNIGA.

26. LUISA8 ENRIQUEZ (FERNANDO7, MARIA6 PEREZ-DE-VELASCO-Y-MANRIQUE, PEDRO5 FERNANDEZ-DE-VELASCO, 1ST COUNT OF HARO, JUAN4, PEDRO3, FERNAN2 SANCHEZ-DE-VELASCO, SANCHO1) She married ANTONIO PIMENTEL, 6TH COUNT OF BENAVENTE, son of ALFONSO PIMENTEL and ANA DE VELASCO-Y-HERRERA.

Child of LUISA ENRIQUEZ and ANTONIO PIMENTEL is:

i. JUAN-ALONSO9 PIMENTEL, m. CATALINA DE QUINONES.

Endnotes

1. Nobiliario Genealogico de los Reyes y Titulos de Espana, by Alonso Lopez de Haro (1622), Vol. 1, Page 185..

2. Glosas a la Casa de Cordova, Tomo Primero, by Don Vicente Porras Benito.

3. Glosas a la Casa de Cordova, Tomo Primero, by Don Vicente Porras Benito, Page 61. Table 10..

4. Glosas a la Casa de Cordova, Tomo Primero, by Don Vicente Porras Benito, Page 58..

5. Glosas a la Casa de Cordova, Tomo Primero, by Don Vicente Porras Benito, Page 443..
